

CS50 lectures

What is it you want to accomplish with R?

Visuals? Focus on learning how to use the ggplot2 package.

Data wrangling? Tidyverse

Data Exploration? DataExplorer and Correlationfunnel

Querying DBs? DBplyr, DBI, or SQLdf packages

Automating reports? The above plus a package for whatever medium you want to deliver the report.

Excel and/or Outlook email? Readxl, RDCOMclient

PDF, HTML, PP? RMarkdown

Dashboard? Shiny
